RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STAR READY set the early pace battled gamely. MAIN DUDE patiently stalked early, advanced along the rail through the bend, battled through the lane gamely. FLASH FREDDIE was off slow was given time to find his stride, was placed in contention at the quarter pole chased for show. DIXIELAND STORMING off slow, mild bid. CLEARLY A JET was never a factor. ZAPAWAY no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Star Ready
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, battled gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Flash Freddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, patiently waited, advanced late up for show.

ENTRY.NAME: Main Dude
ENTRY.OWNER: Fontenot Patricia M and Fontenot Kevin B
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, advanced, battled and matched strides stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Dixieland Storming
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Zapaway
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Clearly a Jet
ENTRY.COMMENT: waws never a factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIT A SHUCK set the pace and was able to hold sway. RED RAIDER XPRESS raced from the two path while stalking the leader, mild bid at the quarter pole, raced on for place. RONALDS GATSBY was off a touch slow, raced from the six path while advancing quickly, mild bid through the turn, held sway. STRUTTIN APRIORITY well placed early, faltered. CUNNING never involved. HE'S A CLASSIC stalked the early pace and was in contention but stopped in the lane. RAY'S BIG BOY was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Struttin Apriority
ENTRY.COMMENT: well positioned early, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Red Raider Xpress
ENTRY.COMMENT: two path, stalked, finished gamely.

ENTRY.NAME: Lit a Shuck
ENTRY.COMMENT: set the pace, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Cunning
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Ray's Big Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: was no factor

ENTRY.NAME: He's a Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace early, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Ronalds Gatsby
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, advanced quickly from the outside, chased

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 6, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 6, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE MISSING PIECE was off the pace early, was given time to find her stride while saving ground early, shifted outside through out the turn, was given the que at the quarter pole where she gamely responded, was kept to task through the lane took the lead in the furlong ground was up for the win. ROSE CROWN stalked the early pace, advanced at the quarter pole in between horses, caught the early leader in the furlong ground, but was caught late . PRAYERS SAVED was off a bit slow from the outside, moved up quickly along the backside, was in contention at the quarter pole made a bid was able to get the lead but was caught late. POINT OF VICTORY stalked the early leaders then ran flat late. CHARLIE'S PEAK set the pace, saved ground along the fence, quit. HOLY SONG never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Rose Crown
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, mild bid quarter pole, led, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: The Missing Piece
ENTRY.OWNER: Harden Patricia M and Hargrave Randall
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, settled

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Summer Grove Farm, LLC & Terry Gabriel

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie's Peak
ENTRY.COMMENT: set the pace, raced inside, quit

ENTRY.NAME: Point of Victory
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked the early leaders, raced flat late

ENTRY.NAME: Prayers Saved
ENTRY.COMMENT: was off slow, raced outside, moved into contention, led, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAP ARTIST stalked the early pace from the outside, was asked at the half mile pole and responded well, passed the early leader and showed the way from there. PRICED RIGHT set the early pace, was caught by an outside foe at the half mile pole but held on for second. JESUIT was off a touch slow, steadily advanced, closed down the lane but was not enough today. MESABI had a slow start, slightly advanced through the first half mile of the race, made a mild bid late. BUTWAITTHERE'SMORE mid pack early but had no finish. WHISKEY GENT showed brief speed early, then slowly gave way. MARKETBOOK raced mid pack early, slightly advanced into third place at the half mile pole, then quit in the lane. NEVER OVER ME showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Rap Artist
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, moved at the half mile pole took control, held

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Gent
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, falttered

ENTRY.NAME: Jesuit
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, saved ground, steadily closed, not enough today.

ENTRY.NAME: Priced Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: set the early pace, was caught, but held on for second.

ENTRY.NAME: Never Over Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Butwaitthere'smore
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, no finish

ENTRY.NAME: Mesabi
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow start, slightly gained ground, put in a mild bid late.

ENTRY.NAME: Marketbook
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced mid pack, moved up at the half, then stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 29000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAENZ set the pace, maintained comfortably fractions and was uncontested. HANNAH'S HAVEN mildly stalked the pace, put in a mild bid at the quarter pole but was second best today. MAGNA COLORS raced mid pack early put in a mild bid late. NAVAGATIONALBEACON broke sharp, settled into a stalking position but faded into the stretch. COURTLY DOC was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Hannah's Haven
ENTRY.COMMENT: mildly staked the pace, mild bid, closed, second best.

ENTRY.NAME: Saenz
ENTRY.COMMENT: set the pace, raced comfortably, uncontested.

ENTRY.NAME: Navagationalbeacon
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, stalked early, faded in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Courtly Doc
ENTRY.OWNER: Estate of Jerry D Cart and Lanasa Jr Marion
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Magna Colors
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, slightly advanced late.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SCARLETTSBLACKJACK set pace, drew off. DOCTOR LEO stalked from mid pack, waited for room, advanced at the quarter pole and was up for place. LILRASCALMAN raced from the mid pack early on, was allowed to race at the one pace until the quarter pole, mild bid and closed well. LOUISIANA FLASH chased the early pace, then tired after the quarter pole. ZION was off a bit slow, raced at one pace until the quarter pole, made a mild bid down the lane. TRIPPER JOHN raced flat. SABER RUN waw no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Doctor Leo
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, mid pack, mild bid, up for show.

ENTRY.NAME: Louisiana Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the early pace, gave way through the lane

ENTRY.NAME: Tripper John
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced flat

ENTRY.NAME: Lilrascalman
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced from mid pack, slightly advanced late.

ENTRY.NAME: Zion
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, slight effort late.

ENTRY.NAME: Saber Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: was no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Scarlettsblackjack
ENTRY.COMMENT: set the fractions, drew off late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 7 1/2F Turf CR: 75. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $17,500, if for $15,000, allowed 2 lbs. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at one mile and seventy yards) (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: A MILLION STARS stalked the early leaders, raced patiently until the quarter pole, was put to task and cllosed well catching the early leaders late. OGRE'S LION KING off slow, was unhurried, closed well late. REVERENT set the early pace, traded paces with another competitor for the first half mile, had the lead at the quarter pole, but was caught late. THUNDER ROAD raced from mid pack, and showed little through out. PINCH HITTER was close early, took the lead at the half mile pole, maintained the lead at the quarter pole then tire. RISKTAKER never involved. ALLIGATOR CRAWL was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: A Million Stars
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked from mid pack, closed well.

ENTRY.NAME: Ogre's Lion King
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, steadily gained ground through out, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Reverent
ENTRY.COMMENT: set early place, maintained close position, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Thunder Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced midpack, no improvement

ENTRY.NAME: Alligator Crawl
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Risktaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Pinch Hitter
ENTRY.OWNER: Haas Margaret Lanetta and Womack Larry D
ENTRY.COMMENT: was close early took command briefly, tired late.
